DOC.criteria: V.1 . Patients V.1.1 . Diseases Hematological malignancy confirm histologically rapidly progress : AML CR ; ALL CR ; CML unresponsive/intolerant Imatinib blast crisis ; Other myeloproliferative disorder blast crisis extensive myelofibrosis ; MDS < 5 % blast ; Multiple myeloma ; CLL ; NonHodgkin 's lymphoma ( aggressive NHL chemosensitive disease ) ; Hodgkin 's disease . V.1.2 . Clinical situation Theoretical indication standard allotransplant , feasible : Age > 55 yr ; Unacceptable end organ performance ; Patient 's refusal . Indication standard autotransplant : perform miniallotransplantation 26 month standard autotransplant . V.1.3 . Other inclusion criterion Male female ; fertile female patient must use reliable contraception method ; Age < 75 yr . Informed consent give patient his/her guardian minor age . V.1.4 . Exclusion criteria Any condition fulfil inclusion criterion ; HIV positive ; Terminal organ failure , except renal failure ( dialysis acceptable ) ; Uncontrolled infection , arrhythmia hypertension ; Previous radiation therapy precluding use 2 Gy TBI ; HLAidentical donor . Inclusion criterion Related recipient ( sibling , parent child ) unrelated ; Male female ; Weight > 15 Kg ( leukapheresis ) ; Fulfills generally accept criterion allogeneic PBSC donation ; Informed consent give donor his/her guardian minor age , per donor center standard procedure . V.2.2 . Exclusion criteria Any condition fulfil inclusion criterion ; HIV positive ; Unable undergo leukapheresis poor vein access reason . V.2.3 .
